#summary Documentation for the MPOAuthAPIRequestLoader class responsible for encapsulating API requests
#labels Documentation
#sidebar TOCMPOAuthTopics

= Introduction =

MPOAuthAPIRequestLoader encapsulates API requests to the service endpoint in order to keep the request, response, and connection together.
